feed.title: RSS Translator Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for RSS Translator: 2025.7.29
entry.content:
修复feed name始终为默认值的问题 优化fetch_feed

Fix feed name always being the default value Optimize fetch_feed

entry.title: New release for RSS Translator: 2025.7.30
entry.content:
• OpenAI 接口添加 rpm 设置
  • 优化添加表单的样式
  • 添加过滤器
  • OpenAI interface add rpm settings
  • Optimize the style of the add form
  • Add filters

entry.title: New release for RSS Translator: 2025.8.1
entry.content:
✅ 升级前请确认您的当前版本为 2025.7.* 系列 ⚠️ 重要提示：如需从更早版本升级，请先升级至 2025.7 系列任一版本，再升级到该版本 ✅ 如果您是全新安装，可直接使用该版本。

  • 重构 model 架构代码
  • 重命名 translator 为 agent

✅ Before upgrading, please make sure that your current version is 2025.7.* series ⚠️ IMPORTANT: If you need to upgrade from an earlier version, please upgrade to any version of the 2025.7 series before upgrading to this version ✅ If you have a fresh installation, you can use this version directly.

  • Refactoring model architecture code
  • Rename translator to agent

entry.title: New release for RSS Translator: 2025.8.4
entry.content:
修复内容翻译问题

Fix content translation issues

entry.title: New release for RSS Translator: 2025.8.8
entry.content:
• 给过滤器添加 AI 功能，可使用 AI 进行过滤
  • 转换 类别 为 标签，同时支持应用过滤器
  • 支持 gpt-5 模型
  • 其他细节和bug修复
  • Added AI capabilities to filters, allowing the use of AI for filtering
  • Converted categories into tags while retaining filter application support
  • Added support for the gpt-5 model
  • Other minor improvements and bug fixes
